title: Deer Avenger 4: The Rednecks Strike Back
description:
This game was made in 2001, its pretty old school, but its still very fun.

It runs high resolutions, which suprised me (I ran it on 1920x1200 no problems)

It also runs on Vista, with no need for setting it compatible to XP or anything.



Basically your a deer killing hunters, you use lures, and calls, and farts to attract the hunters, or you go find them, and kill them basically.

You get an array of weapons (off the hunters bodys) and you build an armory in your cave...

For a 300MB game it's hella fun ;)


~~~~~~

1. Mount ISO (Via PowerISO or any other software that handles ISO's)
2. Launch
3. Install
4. That's it, there is no CD key, yes, it's THAT old.

~~~~~~
